cause.description:
This is a small beginning, but it has to be done cause I feel it is getting out of hand. They go to school almost 7 days a week 365 days a year. Always busy preparing for some test or exam. Always have some other extra class.
The reason for creating this cause is first to creat and awareness of what is going on and then building a network of people around the island to help liften the burden on our poor students.
1. They are children
2. They are our future
3. They need to discover themselves
cause.mission: Life - Carpe Diem - Make everyday count
cause.name: Pressure Relief: Taiwanese Students
